description: The disorders of Ketolysis pathway described the molecular mechanism utilized under starvation or fasting conditions.  This pathway was inspired by Chapter 23 of the book of Blau, edition 4 (ISBN 3642403360 (978-3642403361)), Figure 23.3.  For the ketone body pathway see: [WP5175](https://www.wikipathways.org/index.php/Pathway:WP5175)
title: Disorders in ketolysis
